There is no charAt
No easily usable substring

Swift 3 got worse
more like swift .3

how do you not have basic functions like that
They have them, they're just complicated
Can you still make apps in pure objective-c?
Yea
Yes. But objective c is a lot harder
Yes, they have more intuitive substring and charAt functions but making an app is over all more complicated and messy
Swift does a great job of having clean more readable code than Objective C

=== does not

also check this out for question 14 and let me know if it seems right to you

I would not change anything to allow for multiple products to be included under one Order. Order already has the productId as part of its table and this is the main value to separate items. The other value that is crucial to showing that multiple products are under the same order is the Order Id. As long as the order’s Id and productId are not null, you can see that multiple products belong to the same order. They may show up in separate rows but nevertheless, will have the same order Id.
